contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox German location |image_photo = |Wappen = Wappen Volkerode.png |lat_deg = 51 |lat_min = 15 |lat_sec = 29 |lon_deg = 10 |lon_min = 4 |lon_sec = 37 |Lageplan = Volkerode in EIC.svg |Bundesland = Thüringen |Landkreis = Eichsfeld |Verwaltungsgemeinschaft = Ershausen/Geismar |Höhe = 330 |Fläche = 6.88 |Einwohner = 264 |Stand = 2006-12-31 |PLZ = 37308 |Vorwahl = 036082 |Kfz = EIC |Gemeindeschlüssel = 16 0 61 098 |Adresse-Verband = Kreisstr. 4<br />37308 Schimberg |Website = [http://www.ershausen-geismar.de/index.php?id=59 www.ershausen-geismar.de] |Bürgermeister = Wilhelm Waldmann |Partei = CDU }} '''Volkerode''' is a [[Thuringia]]n municipality in the district of [[Eichsfeld (district)|Eichsfeld]] in Germany. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{de}} {{Cities and towns in Eichsfeld (district)}} {{Eichsfeld-geo-stub}}
